extension.dc:title: GGBN Permit Extension
extension.name: Permit
extension.dc:description: Support for all kinds of permits as an extension for Material Sample core sample data in Darwin Core. Intended to be a one to many relation to the Material Sample core.

property.name: permitType
property.dc:description: A permit is a document that allows someone to take an action that otherwise would not be allowed. Mandatory element
property.examples: Collecting Permit, Import Permit, Export Permit, Intellectual Property Rights, Copyright, Patent, Data use, Phytosanitary, Salvage, Exemption Permit, Material Transfer Agreement, Internationally Recognized Certificate of Compliance, contract, Memorandum of Understanding, Memorandum of Cooperation, Veterinary Certificate, Human Pathogens, Genetically Modified Organism, Other

property.name: permitStatus
property.dc:description: Information about the presence, absence or other basic status of permits associated with the sample(s). Mandatory element
property.examples: Permit available, Permit not required, Permit not available, Unknown Material collected after 2014-10-12 cannot be in "Unknown" permit status!

property.name: permitStatusQualifier
property.dc:description: Description of why a certain permit was not required or why Permit Status is unknown
property.examples: "no national requirement for a permit at date of access", "officially authorized illegal holder", "collected on private land", "pre-Nagoya"

property.name: permitURI
property.dc:description: A reference to the permit related to the gathering or shipping event

property.name: permitText
property.dc:description: The text of a permit related to the gathering/shipping or further details
